mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mysql.TB_BOARD ( TITLE, CONTENTS, HIT_CNT, DEL_GB, CREA_DTM, CREA_ID ) VALUES ( #{TITLE}, #{CONTENTS}, 0, 'N', SYSDATE(), 'Admin' )
mapper.update: UPDATE mysql.TB_BOARD SET HIT_CNT = ifnull(HIT_CNT, 0) + 1 WHERE IDX = #{IDX}
mapper.select: SELECT IDX, HIT_CNT, CREA_ID, CREA_DTM, TITLE, CONTENTS FROM mysql.TB_BOARD WHERE IDX = #{IDX}
